solution_line_template: In {years_in_future} years, Heath will be {heath_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{heath_current_age}+{years_in_future}={heath_future_age}>>{heath_future_age} years old.
In {years_in_future} years, Jude will be {heath_future_age} / {jude_age_multiplier} = <<{heath_future_age}/{jude_age_multiplier}={jude_future_age}>>{jude_future_age} years old.
The difference in their ages is {heath_future_age} - {jude_future_age} = <<{heath_future_age}-{jude_future_age}={age_difference}>>{age_difference} years.
Today, Jude will be {heath_current_age} - {age_difference} = <<{heath_current_age}-{age_difference}={jude_current_age}>>{jude_current_age} years old.
